sources.title: The Thousand Plane Raid (1969) Christopher George Â· Laraine Stephens
sources.description: After initially bad experiences, a US colonel quickly turned his bomber squadron into proven pilots in 1943, who ultimately systematically destroyed the Focke-Wulf factories in Merseburg.

metadata.Plot: A U.S. Air Force colonel convinces the Allies during World War II that a daylight bombing raid of Germany will bring a quick end to the war.
metadata.Writer: Ralph Barker, Donald S. Sanford, Robert Vincent Wright
metadata.Actors: Christopher George, Laraine Stephens, J.D. Cannon
